name: Defeat Goliath Tank in the Amusement Park
Interact with the Lunar Tear in the Forest
Complete a speed star race without jumping
Complete negotiations dealing and taking no damage or leaving bounds
Obtain Fang of the Twins
Obtain Beastbane
Upgrade Machine Axe to level 2
Complete Sorting Trouble
Interact with the Lunar Tear in the Commercial Center
Activate 6 transporters
Complete 11B’s Memento
Die in the factory at level 7 8 9 or 10
Fish in the cavern near Emil's home
Activate Flooded City: Coast Transporter
Obtain Type-4O Sword
Ride an animal from the forest castle to the commercial facility
Collect 1x Copper, Silver, and Gold Ore
Upgrade Ancient Overlord to level 2
Kill 3 worm machines without pod fire/pod programs
Get Ending N (Destroy the machines in Pascal’s Village)
Obtain a machine weapon from two different shops
Obtain Type-4O Lance
Lower the bridge shortcut in the factory
Upgrade YoRHa-issue Blade to level 2
Catch 3 different fish
